summary:
Add Bandit Raids on Military Camps
Vanilla Assets Only No Script
descriptionHtml:
Add Bandit Raids on Military Camps
Vanilla Assets Only No Script

Recommended Mods that will Enable Camps after Civil War.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74572]Re-enable Stormcloak Military Camps[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74554]Re-enable Imperial Military Camps[/url]

Recommended Mods for more soldiers.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57727]HOPv - Horses On Patrol - Vanilla[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79157]HOPs - Horses On Patrol - Stormcloaks[/url]

Story:
The Military Resources of the Imperial and Stormcloak Camps attracts the greedy bandits.

[b][size=3]Bandits that die will respawn within 10 days
just dont visit the place within 10 days.[/size][/b]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Each Military Camp will spawn 10 random generated vanilla bandits.
There are total of 16 Imperial and Stormcloak Military Camps across Skyrim.
See this link page for their location. [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Military_Camps]Military Camps Guide[/url]

[color=#ff7700]Updates:
[color=#ff7700][color=#ff7700]V2c  10 Bandits starts with Level 50[/color][/color]
[color=#ff7700]V2b  10 Bandits starts with Level 100[/color] levels the same with player
V2    10 Bandits that will slaughter the soldiers[/color]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update to latest version: Download and Overwrite if ask
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
author: dlarkz
